item.title: 兴登堡继续关注阿达尼集团，目标清单不断扩大
item.description: 在兴登堡研究有限责任公司（Hindenburg Research LLC）首次对阿达尼集团提出欺诈指控 18 个多月后，这家美国做空机构已成功地将其视角扩大到印度第二富豪所经营的企业集团之外，从而使这一传奇事件继续成为焦点。【原文：More than 18 months after Hindenburg Research LLC first leveled fraud allegations at the Adani Group, the US short seller has managed to keep the saga in the spotlight by widening its lens beyond the conglomerate run by India’s second-richest man.】

item.title: 中国对加拿大矿业开采和加工限制的考验
item.description:
紫金矿业集团股份有限公司正在就限制外国 国家投资国内外项目的规定向特鲁多政府提出挑战。【原文：

Zijin Mining Group Co. is challenging the Trudeau government over rules limiting foreign state investment in projects at home and abroad.

】

item.title: Vista 收购 Cinven 旗下 Jaggaer 公司的谈判进入高级阶段
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Vista Equity Partners 正在就从 Cinven 收购私营软件公司 Jaggaer 进行深入谈判。【原文：Vista Equity Partners is in advanced talks to acquire privately held software company Jaggaer from Cinven, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 希腊 Metlen 公司力争 2025 年第一季度在伦敦上市
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，Metlen Energy & Metals SA 的目标是最快于第一季度在伦敦证券交易所上市，这有可能将其海外上市的时间表提前。【原文：Metlen Energy & Metals SA aims to go public on the London Stock Exchange as soon as the first quarter, according to a person familiar with the matter, potentially moving forward its timeline for an overseas listing.】

item.title: 俄罗斯银行争抢人民币，流动性缺口翻倍
item.description: 美国更严格的制裁限制了人民币流向俄罗斯，迫使当地贷款人以更高的利率从中央银行借入人民币。【原文：Tighter US sanctions have curbed the flow of yuan to Russia, forcing local lenders to borrow the currency at a higher rate from the central bank.】

item.title: 花旗银行蒙塔古称科技股面临重大下跌风险
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：US technology stocks are under “significant pressure” as investor positioning remains extended on the bullish side despite the past month’s selloff, according to Citigroup Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 美联储押注过高，对冲基金卢卡斯卖出国债
item.description: 卢卡斯山管理公司（Mount Lucas Management LP）认为，由于美联储不太可能像市场预期的那样大幅降息，投资者现在几乎没有利用美国国债反弹的空间。【原文：Investors have little room to take advantage of the rally in US Treasuries now, with the Federal Reserve unlikely to cut rates as aggressively as the market expects, according to Mount Lucas Management LP.】

item.title: 潘多拉首席执行官称未来十年钻石市场将面临颠覆
item.description: 潘多拉公司（Pandora A/S）的首席执行官预计，不出 10 年，消费者购买实验室培育钻石的数量就会超过开采的钻石，因为他们在购买珠宝时会越来越多地权衡成本和对气候的影响。【原文：Pandora A/S’s chief executive officer expects it will take less than 10 years before consumers buy more lab-grown diamonds than mined stones because they increasingly weigh up costs and climate impact when buying jewelry.】

item.title: 谈判失败后，顶级铜矿的必和必拓工人举行罢工
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group）位于智利的埃斯孔迪达（Escondida）矿的工人在未能达成工资协议后将于周二开始罢工，这为全球最大铜矿的停产创造了条件。【原文：Workers at BHP Group’s Escondida mine in Chile will begin a strike Tuesday after failing to reach a wage agreement, setting the stage for a stoppage at the world’s biggest copper operation.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美国股票期货走高，日本股市正在复苏，中国正试图为其债券市场降温。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. US stock futures are higher, Japanese equities are recovering and China is trying to cool its bond market. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 布雷万-霍华德（Brevan Howard）从千禧年衍生公司 Modular 聘请大卫-纳什（David Nash
item.description: 布雷万-霍华德资产管理公司（Brevan Howard Asset Management）聘请了模块化资产管理公司（Modular Asset Management）的大卫-纳什（David Nash），该公司是 2020 年从千禧年管理有限责任公司（Millennium Management LLC）分离出来的新加坡对冲基金。【原文：Brevan Howard Asset Management has hired David Nash from Modular Asset Management, the Singaporean hedge fund spun off from Millennium Management LLC in 2020.】

item.title: 博鳌亚洲论坛民意调查显示英国是最受青睐的欧洲股市
item.description: 根据美国银行公司（Bank of America Corp）的一项地区调查，英国股市目前是欧洲同类市场中最受青睐的。【原文：Britain’s stock market is now by far the most preferred among European peers, according to a regional survey by Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 泰国推出 43 亿美元支持股市计划
item.description: 泰国国家投资基金计划筹集高达 1,500 亿泰铢（约合 43 亿美元）的资金，以支持亚洲表现最差的股市。【原文：Thailand’s state investment fund plans to raise up to 150 billion baht ($4.3 billion) to help support Asia’s worst-performing stock market.】

item.title: 美国小型企业乐观情绪升至2022年2月以来最高点
item.description: 由于对经济和销售前景更加乐观，7 月份美国小型企业的乐观情绪升至两年多来的最高点。【原文：US small-business optimism increased to a more than two-year high in July on a more sanguine outlook about the economy and sales.】

item.title: 据说贝恩是印度连锁医院 HCG 的领跑者
item.description: 据知情人士透露，贝恩资本已成为收购印度癌症连锁医院 HealthCare Global Enterprises Ltd. 控股权的领跑者。【原文：Bain Capital has emerged as the frontrunner to acquire a controlling stake in Indian cancer hospital chain HealthCare Global Enterprises Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国工资增幅创十年新高，经济前景令人期待
item.description: 一项研究显示，今年德国经通胀调整后的工资增长速度将达到十多年来最快。【原文：Inflation-adjusted wages in Germany will advance at the fastest pace in more than a decade this year, according to a study.】

item.title: 对前景发出警告后，泰康股价创二十年来最大跌幅
item.description: 瑞士实验室设备制造商泰康集团（Tecan Group AG）以制药公司减少支出和中国销售额骤降为由，下调了今年的业绩预期，股价创二十年来最大跌幅。【原文：Tecan Group AG shares slumped the most in two decades after the Swiss maker of laboratory equipment cut its guidance for the year, citing reduced spending by pharmaceutical companies and a plunge in sales in China.】

item.title: 赞比亚在啤酒禁令导致边境关闭后重新开放刚果边境
item.description: 赞比亚与刚果民主共和国的贸易争端导致卢萨卡关闭两国边境，世界第二大铜生产国的出口受阻，在两国官员会晤解决争端之后，赞比亚于周二恢复了与刚果民主共和国的贸易。【原文：Zambia resumed trade with Democratic Republic of Congo Tuesday after state officials met to resolve a trade spat that led to Lusaka closing the nations’ border, blocking exports from the world’s second-biggest copper producer.】

item.title: 尽管中国人民银行采取宽松政策，但中国信贷增长仍低于预期
item.description: 尽管中央政府采取了宽松的货币政策，但中国 7 月份的信贷扩张仍低于预期，而这正是传统上融资活动较为疲软的月份。【原文：China’s credit expanded less than expected in July despite the central government’s monetary easing, during what’s traditionally a weak month for financing activities.】

item.title: 德国投资者信心降至一月以来最低点
item.description: 在一系列令人失望的数据和近期全球股市动荡之后，投资者对德国经济的信心跌至 1 月份以来的最低水平。【原文：Investor confidence in Germany’s economy plummeted to its lowest level since January following a disappointing run of data and the recent turmoil on global stock markets.】

item.title: Just Group 业绩飙升，"超越 "指导目标
item.description: 周二，Just Group Plc 股价飙升至六年来的最高点，原因是退休产品需求旺盛，促使该公司上调了今年的业绩指导，因为该公司将继续从利率上调中获益。【原文：Just Group Plc shares soared to a six-year high on Tuesday as roaring demand for retirement products prompted the company to boost its guidance for the year as it continues to benefit from higher interest rates.】

item.title: 美国银行调查显示对大型科技公司持乐观态度，软着陆尚未打破
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的一项全球调查显示，全球金融市场的波动并没有破坏投资者对美国科技巨头的乐观情绪或经济软着陆的预期。【原文：The volatility in global financial markets hasn’t derailed investor optimism around US technology behemoths or expectations of a soft economic landing, according to a global survey by Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气价格下跌，原因是俄罗斯气流削弱了反弹势头
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格连续第二天下跌，原因是有迹象表明俄罗斯天然气将暂时继续流经乌克兰，从而减缓了看涨押注的热潮。【原文：European natural gas prices declined for a second day on signs that Russian gas will continue flowing across Ukraine for now, slowing a rush toward bullish bets.】

item.title: 拉脱维亚波罗的海航空公司加倍使用空客 A220 新订单
item.description: 波罗的海航空公司（AirBaltic Corp AS）正在加倍扩充其全空客 SE A220 机队，这是拉脱维亚航空公司第四次订购该机型。【原文：AirBaltic Corp AS is doubling down on its all-Airbus SE A220 fleet, with the Latvian carrier placing its fourth follow-on order for the model.】

item.title: 韩国计划举办简报会以促进新参考汇率的采用
item.description: 韩国金融监管机构将举行一次情况通报会，以促进采用其无风险参考利率，因为他们正试图效仿其他国家，摒弃基于银行提交的基准（如 Libor）。【原文：South Korean financial regulators will hold a briefing to boost the adoption of their risk-free reference rate as they seek to follow other countries in moving away from benchmarks based on bank submissions such as Libor.】

item.title: 国际能源署数据显示：如果欧佩克+增加供应，石油市场将面临过剩
item.description: 国际能源机构（International Energy Agency）的数据显示，如果欧佩克+继续实施增加供应的计划，下一季度全球石油市场将从逆差转为顺差。【原文：Global oil markets are poised to swing from a deficit to a surplus next quarter should OPEC+ proceed with plans to boost supplies, data from the International Energy Agency showed.】

item.title: 意大利电信向 Ardian 出售 Inwit 股份将获 2.5 亿欧元收益
item.description: 意大利电信公司（Telecom Italia SpA）出售了其在移动通信塔运营商意大利无线基础设施公司（Infrastrutture Wireless Italiane SpA）的剩余股份，加快了去杠杆化的步伐，并使现金流超过了全年指导水平。【原文：Telecom Italia SpA sold its remaining stake in mobile tower operator Infrastrutture Wireless Italiane SpA, picking up the pace in its drive to de-leverage and boosting cash flow beyond its full-year guidance levels.】

item.title: 投资者等待美国关键通胀数据，欧洲股市上涨
item.description: 欧洲股市周二上涨，追随亚洲股市的涨势，投资者在关键的美国通胀数据公布前持观望态度。【原文：European stocks rose on Tuesday, following gains in Asia with investors in wait-and-see mode ahead of key US inflation data.】

item.title: 交易员希望 Alphabet 的 "像素事件 "能阻止 3,600 亿美元的抛售潮
item.description: Alphabet 公司的投资者们正焦急地等待着周二的谷歌硬件发布会—；他们寄希望于新的人工智能功能，以帮助阻止在短短一个月内使超过 3,600 亿美元市值化为乌有的大跌。【原文：Alphabet Inc. investors are anxiously awaiting a Google hardware event on Tuesday — banking on new AI features to help stop a selloff that’s wiped out more than $360 billion in market value in just one month.】

item.title: 英镑上涨，因就业市场强劲的迹象抵消了降息预期
item.description: 英镑因英国就业市场强劲的迹象而上涨，这使人们对英国央行今年将再降息两次的赌注产生了疑问。【原文：The pound gained on signs the UK jobs market is robust, putting into question bets the Bank of England will deliver two more interest-rate cuts this year.】
